# AsyncContextStringReturn

## <ApiType type="Class" path="prompt_templates/decorator/AsyncContextStringReturn" symbolName="AsyncContextStringReturn" /> AsyncContextStringReturn

Protocol for a context prompt template function that returns a single string.
